title: On320 - Apartment for Sale
details:
2 Bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment for Sale. 36th Floor with spectacular city view.

Fully furnished by Don Carolis and includes electricals items.

Amenities in the Complex include :

Multiple Swimming Pool
Gym
Game Room
Business Centre
Reception Room and Club House
Mini Mart
Laundry
BBQ Facilities on Roof Terrance
6th Floor Garden and Recreation area
